title: 408: Major Announcement! + New Kim K Drama! + Auditioning for Squid Game!
itunes:title: 408: Major Announcement! + New Kim K Drama! + Auditioning for Squid Game!
description:
Bekah is back and The Broads have a very big announcement to share! Then they dive into some current pop culture and wild news! They chat Kim K’s burger and anti aging scandal, the new iPhone updates, d*ck pics, the shocking reality tv version of “Squid Game”, the Chrisley’s potential prison time, and an actor/podcaster’s extraterrestrial boyfriend!

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***FLY BY JING: Get 15% off your entire order at flybyjing.com/CHATTY or use code CHATTY at checkout!
